1370: Alard was born in Den Hof in 1370.
Got married to Vreile at age 23 in 1370.
Had a son with Vreile, Dybben, at age 23.
1371: Had a daughter with Vreile, Gerburgis, at age 24.
Lost son Dybben when Dybben was 2 years old.
1376: Had a daughter with Vreile, Nellen, at age 29.
1377: Had a daughter with Vreile, Esa, at age 30.
1378: Had a daughter with Vreile, Gheesen, at age 31.
1379: Lost daughter Nellen when Nellen was 4 years old.
1380: Had a daughter with Vreile, Cecilia, at age 33.
Lost daughter Esa when Esa was 4 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
